content: age of 3 do not use safety eyes safety eyes are not suitable for children under 3 consider embroidering the eyes instead or simply crochet 2 black circles of 6sc and sew them on you can place markers in the stitches indicated if you want to do these after completing the head round 61 single_crochet into each of the first 6sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 6sts decrease repeat from * around 42sts stuff firmly as you go before the opening gets too small push stuffing from the head down into the neck to ensure your doll is firmly stuffed throughout round 62 single_crochet into each of the first 5sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 5sts decrease repeat from * around 36sts round 63 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 4sts decrease repeat from * around 30sts round 64 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts round 65 single_crochet into each of the first 2sts decrease *single_crochet into each of the next 2sts decrease repeat from * around 18sts round 66 single_crochet into the first st decrease *single_crochet into the next st decrease repeat from * around 12sts round 67 decrease around 6sts fasten_off leaving a tail weave yarn through the front loops of the remaining stitches with a darning needle and pull to close the hole and hide any loose ends add a nose take a length of skin tone yarn and sew it several times loosely over a couple of stitches just below the eyes as shown here colour those cheeks to add colour to your dolls cheeks you can use ordinary blusher and a blusher brush sweep it beneath the eye at an angle up towards the hair line basic hair cap please read advice on hair caps on the next page before starting… this hair cap is worked from the top down in joined rounds at the end of each round join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st from now on work 11hdc join as above 11sts round 2 ch1 work 2hdc in each st around join as before 22sts round 3 ch1 half_double_crochet into the first st work 2hdc into the
